data.title: Loeb Represents Saban Music Group in the Signing of a Multiyear Partnership with Reggaeton Star Don Omar
data.meta_description: Loeb & Loeb advised Saban Music Group (SMG) in the signing of a multiyear partnership with award-winning reggaeton artist Don Omar.
data.text:
Loeb & Loeb advised Saban Music Group (SMG) in the signing of a multiyear partnership with award-winning reggaeton artist, actor and philanthropist Don Omar. As part of the deal, SMG will advance all marketing and recording costs for Omar. Since his 2003 debut, Don Omar has released seven studio albums and racked up several hits on Latin and Tropical music charts worldwide.

Founded by entertainment giant Haim Saban and headed by CEO Gustavo LÃ³pez, Saban Music Group is a publishing, recording, music and entertainment company based in Los Angeles which primarily focuses on signing new talent by connecting artists with business partners. SMG is unique in its ability to act as an independent label while having all the resources of a major conglomerate, and focuses on artists that appeal to audiences on an international level. SMG is home to acts including Static and Ben El, Nakkia Gold and Chesca, among others.

Click here to view more information in Variety.

The Loeb deal team that advised Saban Music Group was led by Entertainment partner Debbie White, with support from associate Daniel Silverman.
